requestBody.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace

data.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Product Variant and Bundle Storefront. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.
